dmca.title: Notification of Claimed Infringement
dmca.body:
Please create a DMCA case for the pdf document. Also attach it to the
case.
 
Thanks.


________________________________

From: Melanie Johnson [mailto:mf.johnson@auckland.ac.nz] 
Posted At: Tuesday, October 31, 2006 7:54 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Notification of Claimed Infringement
Subject: Notification of Claimed Infringement



Dear Andrea Almeida

 

I am writing on behalf of the University of Auckland with regard to a
website hosted by ThePlanet.com which contains material copied directly
from a website the University administers for the New Zealand Institute
of Mathematics and its Applications.

 

Attached are the following documents:

 

1.        A Notification of Claimed Infringement letter from the Executive
Officer of the University; and 
2.        A copy of the webpage posted by the North Western Institute of
Mathematics and its Applications and hosted by ThePlanet.com.  The copy
attached has the text copied from the NZIMA website highlighted in
yellow. 

 

If you have any further queries please do not hesitate to contact myself
or Grant Wills at g.wills@auckland.ac.nz.

 

Melanie Johnson

Assistant to the Executive Officer

Office of the Vice Chancellor

University of Auckland, 

Room 003, Alfred Nathan House, 24 Princes St

PO Box 92019

Auckland

Telephone: 09 373 7599 ext. 88541; Fax: 09 303 5933 

email: mf.johnson@auckland.ac.nz
